sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.youtube-configurator
  v-text-field(:label="label"
               :placeholder="placeholder"
               @keyup.enter="onSubmit").input-style
  v-switch(v-model="autoPause")
</template>

<script>
import { VTextField } from 'vuetify/components/VTextField'
import { VSwitch } from 'vuetify/components/VSwitch'
export default {
  components: {
    VTextField,
    VSwitch
  },
  data(){
    autoPause: false
  },
  emits:['onSubmit'],
  props: {
    placeholder: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    },
    label: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onSubmit(event) {
      const userInput = event.srcElement._value
      if (userInput && userInput.replace(/\s/g, '').length) {
        this.$emit('onSubmit', userInput)
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.youtube-configurator {
  @include flex-center();
  @include flex-row();

  .input-style {
    margin-top: 150px;
    color: red;
    background-color: white;
    max-width: 500px;
    .v-input__details {
      display: none;
    }
  }
}</style>
